formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \(T_d = \frac{b \cdot \alpha(T, RH)}{a - \alpha(T, RH)}\) where \(\alpha(T, RH) = \frac{a \cdot T}{b + T} + \ln(RH / 100)\)

sources.label: Learn more about the Magnus formula
